CONTACT IN LITIGATION

This contact has been identified in association to an investigation.  It requires that we preserve all relevant information in connection with the Account, Contact, and/or Deal information.  Please do not delete or modify information related to this Account, Contact(s), and/or Deal(s)
 
In addition, please do not discuss the investigation with this contact should he/she contact you in connection to details associated to this account.

This Contact has been tagged as "Do Not Lend".  For further details, please refer to Michael Minck, the VP of Legal and Complaince at CoreVest
